Package hwk7

Class AbstractBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • hwk7.AbstractBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoardArray1D, BoardArray2D
    public abstract class AbstractBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This program is to be used for making NPuzzle game
